title: 【急】服务器权限问题！！！速度，求大神
author: super丶鹏哥
txt_content:
我昨天在弄vip权限组，新建了几个
后来有人买了vip给进了权限组然后他只有vip权限，其他权限全部没有，包括，tp，home等等
于是我在/plugins/GroupManager/worlds/world/groups.yml里面吧默认权限组一些东西复制到了vip权限组
然后就出了错，我删除了后今天发现所有人都是op
于是我重新安装权限组插件
又出了问题：所有玩家都没了权限，而且名字都变黄了
怎么办~~~！！！！！！急啊，大神最好是加我QQ：50878304详细告诉我

replies.author: 网络摆渡客
replies.txt_content:
你需要让vip组集成Default组或者Builder组。
类似这样：    inheritance:
    - builder复制代码

replies.author: 筒子
replies.txt_content:
你需要开启权限组
输入这个打开权限组
/mangaddv 权限组名字 build true

replies.author: 周润发
replies.txt_content:
没权限的原因是你重装的权限插件 他的默认组是Default组

在后台把Default组的    default:true这行 改成default:false

把builder组的default:false改成default:true

# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  VIP3:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: '&e'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    - chestcommands.open.simple-shop.yml
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&4'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  VIP1:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  VIP2:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  VIP1y:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  VIP2y:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  VIP3y:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - at.use
    - chestcommands.open.sell.yml
    - chestcommands.open.simple-shop.yml
    - coreprotect.inspect
    - coreprotect.lookup
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - chestcommands.open.simple-shop.yml
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      prefix: '&5'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - chestcommands.open.simple-shop.yml
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      prefix: '&c'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
复制代码

记得是UTF-8ROM格式

replies.author: 琥珀剑心
replies.txt_content: 你起码要让VIP组继承之前的builder组的权限   再单独给予VIP一些其他权限
